ygData.subject: Re: ADM TESTED!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The song affected none of my shield icons.  Maybe I didn t let it play long enough.  On a side note, I caught some player with blood boil at the zoneline,
ygData.messageBody:
> It dispelled Skin like Steel that a ranger had just cast on me (i.e.
> couldn't have "naturally worn off" at the same time song played). Haven't
> tried it vs anything NPC cast yet.

The song affected none of my shield icons. Maybe I didn't let it play
long enough. On a side note, I caught some player with blood boil at
the zoneline, and he reported that it cleared it. I tried it again
last night, and one player said it cleared it after three pulses.
I need to test blood boil (heat blood line) more. I'm gonna try
to login today and duel a few people now that I am realizing it
could take more than one pulse to destroy an effect. As for knocking
down your shield icons, I need to look into that more.

Harmonic.
